skins.shipDescription: Nagato-class battleship number two C Mutsu.
skins.selfIntroduction: I'm Mutsu, second ship of the Nagato class! Nagato and I used to swap back and forth between being the Combined Fleet's flagship! Later on, Yamato took on the role, though! Isn't it amazing how much there is to see in the world~? My third turret? Uh... I think it'll be okay this time.
skins.acquisition: Hello, I'm Mutsu! Nagato's little sister! Um, are you a commander? Why? How do you become a commander? Is it cool to be one? Tell me, I wanna know!
skins.login: Oh, hi, Commander! Something I don't understand happened while you were away! Why do... (Mutsu began asking a series of questions.)
skins.details: Commander, help me inspect my third turret!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Why do we need to write like this? Is it wrong to do it this way? Why?
skins.secretaryIdle2: I saw something interesting outside! Can I go check it out?
skins.secretaryIdle3: I wonder where those ants are heading... I wanna find out!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Commander, why are you touching me? What's the meaning behind it?

skins.shipDescription: Commander, check it out! "Nothing can stop me!" Urakaze made it for me! Now I can play warring states with her! Heheh, you should know I'm a force to be reckoned with! Can't you come play with us? Why?
skins.acquisition: Commander, check it out! "Nothing can stop me!" Urakaze made it for me! Now I can play warring states with her! Heheh, you should know I'm a force to be reckoned with! Can't you come play with us? Why not?
skins.details: Commander, both now and back during the Warring States Period, why do people fight...?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander, why is it that Nagato wants to play with us, but won't say it? Come along, let's invite her to play!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Commander, hey, listen, I know about this massive castle tower! Let's go exploring inside it together!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, Commander! Tell me more stories about the Warring States Period!
skins.secretaryTouch: Hiyaaah! ... Hmm, Commander, how do I learn to look cool while swinging my sword like Takao?
